title: Feature request
body: Please add a "Ban CertainlyT champ" button to banning screen.  When pressed, this button will automatically ban a random champ (prioritizing Yasuo) created by CertainlyT.  Since his champs are among the most commonly banned ones, it would save a lot of time if we could just click this button.

replies.body: As a Darius main I have to object to this feature on principle.
